title: The Hunter's Heart
description: Seram is a hunter .Like his father before him, he hunts the Lemnu - the horrifying half-demons, half-beasts that terrorize the forests and villages of the Duchy of Stonewall. But that's not the only thing he likes to chase after...Following a cartographic expedition to the northern borders he was hired to protect, Seram encounters a young monk with a beautiful face and mysterious past. Soon after, a village hosting them is attacked by a strange Lemnu, of a species nobody has ever seen or heard one that looks remarkably human...
author: Margaret Lanterman
